CustomField.description: If no 'From' field is specified, or if it is BLANK, then this value is sent to the 'To' field for all records instead.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
If no 'From' field is specified, or if it is BLANK, then this value is sent to the 'To' field for all records instead.
If both 'From' and 'Value' are blank and there are no other transformation rules, an empty record is created.
CustomField.label: Value
